alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 12:42AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS, SOUTH CENTRAL PIKE AND WESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 115 AM EDT... At 1241 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near West Union, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, West Union, New Boston, Rosemount, Rome, Lucasville, South Shore, Blue Creek, Rarden, Otway, Concord, Wakefield, Saint Paul, Dunkinsville, Friendship, Mcdermott, Mount Joy, Bear Creek, Cedar Mills and Lombardsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
